Smilingze. ive not download it yet (ill wait a week or two cause its a new game and download is not very fast right now). but i guess its the same thing as resident evil 6 and borderlands 2 that i played with no issues. but ithink you can get BANNED if you your flash is LT2.0 !! (i never play live so in dont care). 
google and download : xbox backup creator and topology 2.0  and the xgd3 game. i didnt use abgx.
inject the topo to your game using xbox backup creator (takes 2 secondes). then u ready to burn with imgburn (speed 2.4X , layer break=optimal, choose truncate when it ask u).
install the game into hdd, and use the mp3 trick before u lauch the game.  Hope this help to play the game but not online!!

@smokingmachine and @dunit80 guys I've been having the same problem with Max Payne 3, I'm on RGH 2.0, well I installed FreeStyle Dash 3 and put the games in this order
Disk 1: x:gamesMOH warfighterdisk1 
Disk 2: x:gamesMOH warfighterdisk2
and it worked... its really easy,
